item.title: Anders is presenting at ESHG22 conference
item.description:
we can embed a twitter by clicking the tweet’s option button and copying the embed code block and paste it here.

I feel quite represented with this slide. Thanks @A_Albrechtsen for this amazing talk and for developing so many methods to work with crappy data (it saved my PhD 🙉💩) #IBEPhDSymposium pic.twitter.com/aSVuZDsCHJ

— Clàudia Fontserè (@ClaudiaFontsere) June 17, 2022

or, we can use tweet’s ID from tweet’s URL:

I feel quite represented with this slide. Thanks @A_Albrechtsen for this amazing talk and for developing so many methods to work with crappy data (it saved my PhD 🙉💩) #IBEPhDSymposium pic.twitter.com/aSVuZDsCHJ

— Clàudia Fontserè (@ClaudiaFontsere) June 17, 2022

item.title: Jian Yang and Monica Hall Win the Best Paper Award at Wowchemy 2020
item.description:
Congratulations to Jian Yang and Monica Hall for winning the Best Paper Award at the 2020 Conference on Wowchemy for their paper “Learning Wowchemy”.
